ProteinName	Neuron-specific calcium-binding protein hippocalcin (Calcium-binding protein BDR-2)
GeneName	HPCA BDR2
Length	193
Function	Calcium-binding protein that may play a role in the regulation of voltage-dependent calcium channels (PubMed:28398555). May also play a role in cyclic-nucleotide-mediated signaling through the regulation of adenylate and guanylate cyclases (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Cytosol; Membrane
